author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA STRENGTHENING... ...HEAVY RAIN AND GUSTY WIND THREAT CONTINUES FOR PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA STRENGTHENING... ...HEAVY RAIN AND GUSTY WIND THREAT CONTINUES FOR PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 11:00 PM MST Sun Oct 05 the center of Priscilla was located near 16.9, -107.2 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA STRENGTHENING... ...HEAVY RAIN AND GUSTY WIND THREAT CONTINUES FOR PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 11:00 PM MST Sun Oct 05 the center of Priscilla was located near 16.9, -107.2 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
